property.name: yarn.acl.enable
property.description: Enable ACLs? Defaults to false. The value of the optional is "true" or "false"

property.name: yarn.admin.acl
property.description: ACL to set admins on the cluster. ACLs are of for comma-separated-usersspacecomma-separated-groups. Defaults to special value of * which means anyone. Special value of just space means no one has access

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Configuration to enable or disable log aggregation

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for clients to submit jobs.NOTES:host:port If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn.resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for ApplicationMasters to talk to Scheduler to obtain resources.NOTES:host:port If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn.resourcemanager.hostname

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for NodeManagers.NOTES:host:port If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn.resourcemanager.hostname

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for administrative commands.NOTES:host:port If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn.resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address
property.description: ResourceManager web-ui host:port. NOTES:host:port If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn.resourcemanager.hostname

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.hostname
property.description: ResourceManager host

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.class
property.description: ResourceManager Scheduler class CapacityScheduler (recommended), FairScheduler (also recommended), or FifoScheduler.The default value is "org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.CapacityScheduler".

property.name: yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb
property.description: Minimum limit of memory to allocate to each container request at the Resource Manager.NOTES:In MBs

property.name: yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb
property.description: Maximum limit of memory to allocate to each container request at the Resource Manager.NOTES:In MBs

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds
property.description: How long to keep aggregation logs before deleting them. -1 disables. Be careful, set this too small and you will spam the name node.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-check-interval-seconds
property.description: Time between checks for aggregated log retention. If set to 0 or a negative value then the value is computed as one-tenth of the aggregated log retention time. Be careful, set this too small and you will spam the name node.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb
property.description: Resource i.e. available physical memory, in MB, for given NodeManager. The default value is 8192. NOTES:Defines total available resources on the NodeManager to be made available to running containers

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.vmem-pmem-ratio
property.description:
Maximum ratio by which virtual memory usage of tasks may exceed physical memory.
The default value is 2.1
NOTES:The virtual memory usage of each task may exceed its physical memory limit by this ratio. The total amount of virtual memory used by tasks on the NodeManager may exceed its physical memory usage by this ratio.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dir
property.description:
Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where intermediate data is written.
The default value is "${hadoop.tmp.dir}/nm-local-dir"
NOTES:Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs
property.description:
Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where logs are written
The default value is "${yarn.log.dir}/userlogs"
NOTES:Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log.retain-seconds
property.description:
Default time (in seconds) to retain log files on the NodeManager Only applicable if log-aggregation is disabled.
The default value is "10800"

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir
property.description:
HDFS directory where the application logs are moved on application completion. Need to set appropriate permissions. Only applicable if log-aggregation is enabled.
The default value is "/logs" or "/tmp/logs"

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir-suffix
property.description: Suffix appended to the remote log dir. Logs will be aggregated to ${yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir}/${user}/${thisParam} Only applicable if log-aggregation is enabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services
property.description: Shuffle service that needs to be set for Map Reduce applications.
